title: 5 Quick Steps to Change Your About Me on Roblox

steps.title: Go to https://www.roblox.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.roblox.com/ in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your username, email, or phone number and password to do so now. You can also create a new account .

steps.title: Click Profiles.
steps.content: Click Profiles . You can find this in the left panel, underneath Home .

steps.title: Click the pencil icon next to "About".
steps.content: Click the pencil icon next to "About". This will allow you to edit the About section. [1] X Research source A text box will open.

steps.title: Type what you want to share.
steps.content: Type what you want to share. Remember, never share any personal details about yourself online to keep yourself safe . Try adding funny quotes , uplifting messages , or even a list of your favorite games. You can edit this information at any time.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This will save your new About section. Other Roblox players will be able to see it when they visit your profile.
